work.summary: Developed web applications for clients and internal use using Node and a variety of front-end technologies like React, Webpack, and ES2015.
highlights: Led front-end development of multi-platform single page app for CAA music clients to plan and route worldwide tours
Led front-end development for the Node Security Platform public and admin interfaces
Wireframed and built front-end and application server for Heroku data vizualization to showcase Kafka support
Consolidated marketing sites to use a single front-end framework and shared plugins with require.js
Wrote plugins for multi-platform analytics, glossary word highlighting, and push state navigation for use across all sites
Manage a team creating front-end templates for a large stable of MVC data driven sites with an emphasis in cross-browser compatibility and HTML view and CSS reuse
Work as a team member writing full stack code (PHP, HTML, CSS, JS) for MVC architected websites
Manage JIRA workflows to track bugs in development, staging and production environments
Engineer AS3 classes, PHP and JS to create an isometric Flash game for Facebook deployment
Create AS3 classes for use in a SWC game engine for current & future isometric Flash games
Develop front and back end business solutions for the web both individually and as a team member
Communicate with coworkers, supervisors and clients about project goals and results
Skills used: PHP4/5, JavaScript, jQuery, Flex, Flash, AS2/3, MySQL, X/HTML, CSS 2/3, LAMP, MAMP, WordPress, Joomla, Photoshop, Coda, WHM, cPanel, AJAX
